snippet: After a decade in soccer on the Continent, Manager Manuel Pellegrini, 60, collected his first European winners’ medal as Manchester City beat Sunderland in London in the League Cup.
abstract: Manchester City beats Sunderland, 3-1, in the League Cup, as manager Manuel Pellegrini collects his first European winners' medal following a decade in soccer on the Continent; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: After a decade in soccer on the Continent, Manager Manuel Pellegrini, 60, collected his first European winners’ medal as Manchester City beat Sunderland in London in the League Cup.
